snippet: Jim Head, a co-chief of Morgan Stanley’s mergers and acquisitions for the Americas, is leaving for the firm founded by Byron Trott, formerly of Goldman Sachs.
abstract: DealBook Online; BDT & Co hires Jim Head as partner; Head was co-chief of Morgan Stanley's mergers and acquisitions for the Americas.

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. de la MERCED

lead_paragraph: Jim Head, a co-chief of Morgan Stanley’s mergers and acquisitions for the Americas, is leaving for the firm founded by Byron Trott, formerly of Goldman Sachs.

headline.main: Morgan Stanley Deal Maker to Join BDT & Co.
